subject: Delivery delayed
description_text:
Hello,

I placed an order on November 20 under the number SSN3679.

I paid for express delivery, which is between 3-7 days, as it was a gift. However, it is now December 9th, and 19 days have already passed with no notice of when it will be delivered.

It seems I paid for a service that I did not receive, so I would like to have my money returned. After this bad experience, I will never try to buy here again.

Thank you.

conversations.body_text: Hi Javi, Hello, I'm sorry for the delay in logistics. My tracking information shows your order has already been signed for.
